alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 3:47AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lake County through 415 AM CDT... At 345 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Highland Lake, or 34 miles northeast of Superior, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Castle Danger and Split Rock Lighthouse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
